articles.description: Rahul Dravid faces an acid Test going into the T20 World Cup and former BCCI selector Saba Karim says that this is a 'crunch time' for him.
articles.content: Ahead of the T20 World Cup in Australia, which starts in mid-October, the Indian cricket team got a wake-up call in the Asia Cup. The Rahul Dravid-coached side could not enter the final after losses … [+1756 chars]

articles.author: Tim Vickery
articles.title: Brazil are strong World Cup favourites, so why is Tite's squad selection so erratic? - ESPN India
articles.description: Gabriel Jesus, Phillippe Coutinho, Dani Alves, Gabriel Martinelli and more: The names missing from Brazil's pre-Qatar squad raise some eyebrows.
articles.content: Brazil's record last season makes impressive reading: 10 wins and three draws, with 30 goals scored and just four conceded. It might be thought, then, that the team would be sailing in the calmest of… [+5617 chars]

articles.title: 87 days, 6 medals, 2 national records: Neeraj Chopra's hot streak down to fitness and focus - ESPN India
articles.description: Over 87 days, Neeraj Chopra has picked up a World Championships silver, two personal bests and medals in all six events he competed in, capping it with the Diamond League title.
articles.content: Around this time last year, Neeraj Chopra was the toast of the country. His historic Olympic gold medal led to innumerable felicitations across India and it took him nearly 10 days after returning fr… [+6251 chars]
